lead_paragraph: In a post on Twitter, he said he would “terminate” the pact President Obama made if Cuba is unwilling to make “a better deal for the Cuban people.”

byline.contributor: Damien Cave and Azam Ahmed reported from Havana, and Julie Hirschfield Davis from Washington. Kirk Semple contributed reporting from Havana, Gardiner Harris from Washington, and Frances Robles from Miami.
byline.original: By DAMIEN CAVE, AZAM AHMED and JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS

headline.print_headline: Trump’s Threat to Close Door Reopens Old Wounds in Cuba
headline.main: Donald Trump’s Threat to Close Door Reopens Old Wounds in Cuba

snippet: In a post on Twitter, he said he would “terminate” the pact President Obama made if Cuba is unwilling to make “a better deal for the Cuban people.”...
abstract: Pres-elect Donald Trump, in statement on Twitter, threatens to reverse Pres Obama's more open policy toward Cuba if country is not willing to make better deal; Trump's declaration raises question of how feasible it is to end detente after two years and millions of dollars in American money invested in country.
